lead_paragraph: The Lakers beat the Nuggets to go up, 3-2, in the Western Conference finals. The Yankees and Mets both move into first place. And a Detroit newspaper promotes violence against cute little Penguins.
snippet: The Lakers beat the Nuggets to go up, 3-2, in the Western Conference finals. The Yankees and Mets both move into first place. And a Detroit newspaper promotes violence against cute little Penguins.
